**Summary:** Form 16 Part A provides TDS authentication and traceability - your tax deduction proof.

**Part A Component Analysis:**

| **Employer Details** | Name, TAN, Address | Deductor identification | Verify TAN validity |
| **Employment Period** | From/To dates | Income period scope | Ensure covers full FY |
| **Quarterly Summary** | Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4 TDS | Progressive deduction | Match with salary slips |
| **Challan Details** | BSR Code, Date, Serial | Deposit proof | Cross-check with Form 26AS |
| **Certificate Details** | Date of issue, Auth signature | Validation | Ensure issued by 15th June |

**Critical Importance:** Part A proves your employer actually deposited the TDS claimed. Without proper challan traceability, you may face refund delays or tax demands.
